mapper.select: select si.stu_no as stuNo,si.stu_name as stuName,st.id as id,ti2.topic_name as topicName,st.progress from teacher_info ti1 left join selected_topic st on st.teacher_id = ti1.id left join topic_info ti2 on st.topic_id = ti2.id left join student_info si on si.id = st.stu_id where ti1.teacher_no = #{teacherNo} and st.progress > 11
